conclusion: Plan to analyze v-t graphs to determine maximum distance between truck and bus.
v-t graphs show truck starts at 40 m/s, stops at 10s; bus starts at 30 m/s, stops at 20s.
Truck covers a distance of 200 meters during braking.
Bus covers a distance of 300 meters during braking.
Initially, the vehicles are 30 meters apart.
Maximum distance between vehicles is 530 meters.
